about_the_game:
This is a game made with RPG Maker MZ that follows a young woman that is trying to cope with her life being turned around as the disease she suffers from now forces her to live a different life.

This is game is a work in progress that will receive updates until its completion. The current game takes players between 12 - 20 hours depending on expertise and familiarity with classic style RPGs.

The game is a ATB battle RPG with an art style that will remind you of earlier Final Fantasy games like IV, VI, and IX.

There are multiple characters to play as that will come and go in your party.

Several different locations to discover across five continents once the full game is complete.

content_descriptors.notes: There are implied acts of intimate activity that appear a few times during the game. They occur in dialogue form. There are a few instances of a a few females in their undergarments. They appear in video form and the video can be skipped when given the option. There is no full nudity in the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or better (32 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo 2 or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 / OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: At least a 1280 x 768 resolution monitor

short_description: An RPG that uses the ATB battle system seen in early Final Fantasy games, Short Adventure follows a diseased young woman who goes from every day college student to criminal to outcast as she tries to cope with her life changing quickly. Note: The game is incomplete and will gradually be updated.
